taxon_identification.name_authority_date: xElyhordeum pilosilemma (W.W. Mitch. & H.J. Hodgs.) Barkworth

bio:treatment.description: xElyhordeum pilosilemma (W.W. Mitch. & H.J. Hodgs.) Barkworth
bio:treatment.discussion: xElyhordeum pilosilemma is a hybrid between Elymus macrourus and Hordeum jubatum that occurs in many locations where the two parental species co-occur. It is very similar to xE. jordalii, a hybrid between E. macrourus and H. brachyantherum.
